page.title: 02Attitudes and Life Style.
page.content:
Attitudes.
The people in Maidencombe like peace and quiet and they do not like change. Most of the people who are old,like children if they are quiet and polite. They are home loving people and do not go out frequently and then they would go out in their car.The people enjoy their village and want to keep peaceful and quiet.
Life Style. In Maidencombe most of the people are elderley and not really interested in fashion.They like to spend their time relaxing in their home but they do watch T.V and listen to the music on the radio. If the people wanted to go to a club or cinema they would have to go outside the area.
